籤詩版本二:
Inkemba ikhanya ngokugqamile uma iphuma ebhokisini, kodwa ayihehi uthuli ebhokisini.
Manje senginomuntu ohloniphekile engizovela, onegunya namandla, futhi wonke umuntu uyangithanda
詩意:
Le hexagram imele inkemba ephuma ebhokisini.
Konke kunamandla futhi kunamandla.
解曰: Inkemba iphuma ebhokisini. Ikhanya ngezinkulungwane zamamayela. Isiqondiso esihle. Konke kuhle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong usindisa Adou
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, uZhao Yun, igama elihlonishwayo uZilong, wayengowokuzalwa eChangshan. Ekuqaleni, wayethembele ku-Yuan Shao, wabe eselandela uLiu (Bei), inkosi yokuqala yaseWestern Shu.
Ngaleso sikhathi, uCao Cao wayefuna ukuya eningizimu yoMfula i-Yangtze, waqala ukuhlasela inkosi yangaphambili uLiu Bei eXinye (igama lendawo), futhi inkosi yangaphambili yabalekela eFancheng. Waphinde wahlulwa e-Dangyang futhi amalungu omndeni wakhe ahlukaniswa. U-Zhao Yun wahlangana noNkk Wei (Nkk. Liu Bei) ngaphansi kodonga lomhlaba.
Lona wesifazane waphathisa indodana yakhe u-Adou (indodana kaLiu Bei, uLiu Chan) ku-Zhao Yun. UZhao Yun wanika intokazi ihhashi, kodwa le ntokazi yenqaba ukulamukela futhi yaziphonsela emthonjeni yafa.
Ngemva kokukhala kukaZhao Yun futhi wangcwaba umkakhe, wanga u-Adou futhi walwa nendlela yakhe yokuphuma kulokho kuvinjezelwa.
聖意: Thandazela inhlanhla yomuzi wakho nempilo yakho, ingcebo nenzuzo, umshado omuhle, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla, inhlanhla inhlanhla
